channel.title: Poetry Jam REVIVAL
channel.description:
Yo, it's Aftermath with a brand new rap Last one was locked by a piece of Aussie crap I'm back, and legit, and my bling is clankin' Once I'm done, I'm goin' semen bankin'.
So you see my style, and you see my flow Maybe you're thinkin' you'll join the show Think again before you join in: Shitty poetry is a sin.

item.title: Poetry Jam REVIVAL
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“killerman93, post:17, topic:159635”]I see the guy above me,
a long time ago he went straight and ceased to love me
So I pull out my gun,
Shove it up the MOTHERFUCKERS BUM!
So when ya mum crys,
go get high, I gonna live, yall gonna die,
Float up to some Holy place up in the sky,
When you go there, all I can do is mock you and sigh,
'cos us Souljahs, shoulve toldya’s, that we shot ya father,
Built a gun, got drunk on rum, killerman93 in the house rappin,
3-6-9, ya mama’s fine, did her last night, was a great time,
so now, before a slap yow ass up, put ya lil bitch down and SHUT THE FUCK UP![/quote]

Poetry?

Read full topic

item.title: Poetry Jam REVIVAL
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

[quote=".Flair, post:11, topic:159635"]I look at all your shit
My decision is made in one second split
Too many words
Hurt my eyes
So seriously mufucker
l2summerize[/quote]

Summary:

[quote=“Aftermath, post:10, topic:159635”]The sun blinds me, my eyes disabled,
I have seen the truth of the fable
I have escaped from Plato’s cave,
But my life the truth can’t save.

Ashes to ashes, dust to dust,
In my mind, I have no trust
Belief, faith, alias of weakness
Strength, incarnate, in my dress

Bellowing, the horse does run
Onwards, down the fiery path
Xerxes, Yerda, Zimmerman,

On these names I do invoke
Fearsome spirits I provoke

Another is the same, yet I do not
In my sickness, leave to rot
Deviant thoughts and errant plots
Sacriligious heresy of the tots[/quote]

Read full topic

The sun blinds me, my eyes disabled,

But my life the truth can’t save.

Ashes to ashes, dust to dust,
In my mind, I have no trust
Belief, faith, alias of weakness
Strength, incarnate, in my dress

Bellowing, the horse does run
Onwards, down the fiery path

On these names I do invoke
Fearsome spirits I provoke

Another is the same, yet I do not
In my sickness, leave to rot
Deviant thoughts and errant plots
Sacriligious heresy of the tots

item.title: Poetry Jam REVIVAL
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Life at this time
is depressing online,
emos are cutting,
moparscapers C&P tuting.
Driving me crazy
with there lazy,
mispelling.

OM Sucked. I used to be good at this sort of stuff but I haven’t done an English lesson in 6 months :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2007, 02:41:07 AM[/size][hr]I remembered I am good at Limericks.

There once was an albino monk,
who had an enormous trunk.
he stumbled one day and fell in some hay.
and now he’s got straw up his rump.

…that also sucked…

Read full topic

item.title: Poetry Jam REVIVAL
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Thou art an artless, base-court apple-john,
Beslubb’ring all whose gaze thou looks upon,
Thou bootless, beatle-headed, bladder bug,
Churlishly boil-brained, clapper-clawed old slug!
Thou art so common-kissing, canker-clawed,
Dissembling, dizzy-eyed and mealy-mawed!
Thy dankish, dismal-dreaming, clotpoled ways
Are more errant, in thy unmuzzled daze,
Than any foot-licked, flea-bit flap-dragon,
Or gleeking, half-faced, hedge-pigged jothead on
A paunchy, ill-bred, loutish miscreant -
Thou ever moldwarped, spleeny sycophant!
Were thou less blind in thy bummed, venomed spleen,
Thou wouldst know very well … it’s thee I mean!

Read full topic
